short_summary: This solicitation is for the purchase of the maintenance and support for TeamTrack
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of the maintenance and support for TeamTrack and related technical specifications
tags: SSC TeamTrack Maintenance and Support for CIHR (BPM020459)- Amendment 000
full_summary:
### TeamTrack Maintenance and Support for CIHR

#### Solicitation Reference

* Solicitation Number: **BPM020459/25521**
* Tender Reference Number: **SSC-24-00025521:T**

#### Notice Details

* Publication Date: **2024-02-07**
* Tender Closing Date: **2024-02-22T00:00:00**
* Tender Status: This solicitation has expired.

#### Contract Requirements

This solicitation is to acquire maintenance and support services for TeamTrack and related technical specifications. The successful bidder will provide ongoing support and maintenance for the TeamTrack platform.

#### Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: None
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Clara Whittaker
	+ Email: Not available
	+ Phone: 343-553-8354
	+ Fax: 343-553-8354
	+ Address: 180 Kent St, Ottawa, ON K1P 0B6

#### Tenders and Submissions

To register and submit a tender, visit the Supplier Portal (APL) and follow the onboarding process: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

#### Attachments and Documents

For more information, please refer to the following attachment: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B6840D82-F5F7-4F94-B37A-4B440108F4CA](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/B6840D82-F5F7-4F94-B37A-4B440108F4CA)
